title: Braden
description: Vengeance was supposed to be easy...Angela:The mysterious stranger has been watching me all night.Those steel colored eyes are always in the corner of mine.Now I'm in the dark all alone....And they're back.Who is Braden, and what does he want with me?...Why do I feel drawn to a man I don't even know?Braden:Her father sent mine into an early grave.Vengeance demands an eye for an eye.He'll feel the pain I felt, the pain of loss.She will be the one who suffers for his mistakes....But why do I want more than blood when I see her standing in the dark?A taste won't hurt....She'll make a pretty corpse.
author: Adora York
